text:
Tomcat expands the field type in the tag <jsp:plugin type="applet" ...> to:

<EMBED type=\"application/x-java-applet;\"

while this should be:

<EMBED type=\"application/x-java-applet\"

This can be fixed in the file

src/share/org/apache/jasper/compiler/PluginGenerator.java

(Probably the same happens to <jsp:plugin type="beans"...>, but I haven't tested that.
creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org

text:
Fixed on Tomcat 3.2.2.
Fixed on Tomcat 3.3.
creator: nacho@apache.org
